data.title: THE BLACKBAUD GIVING FUND
data.meta_description: Trademark registration for Blackbaud, Inc.. The mark consists of two triangular shapes, one larger placed on the bottom and the smaller one on the top of the larger one's right side and both with a curved side, with the words
data.text:
The mark consists of two triangular shapes, one larger placed on the bottom and the smaller one on the top of the larger one's right side and both with a curved side, with the words "THE BLACKBAUD GIVING FUND" stacked to the right. The words "THE BLACKBAUD" is stacked on top of the words "GIVING FUND".

Mark For: THE BLACKBAUD GIVING FUNDÂ® trademark registration is intended to cover the categories of providing online, non-downloadable software for managing employee engagement and corporate social responsibility programs; Charitable services, namely, providing a website that features technology that enables charitable giving by others; Providing on-line non-downloadable software related to charitable giving, namely, software that enables users to give charitable financial gifts to others; providing on-line non-downloadable software that enables users to grant third parties the ability to choose a charity of their choice and to grant the selected organization a pre-determined charitable financial gift. [all]

>Color is not claimed as a feature of the mark. The mark consists of two triangular shapes, one larger placed on the bottom and the smaller one on the top of the larger one's right side and both with a curved side, with the words "THE BLACKBAUD GIVING FUND" stacked to the right. The words "THE BLACKBAUD" is stacked on top of the words "GIVING FUND".

LIVE APPLICATION Awaiting Examination

The trademark application has been accepted by the Office (has met the minimum filing requirements) and has not yet been assigned to an examiner.

IC 036. US 100 101 102. G & S: Charitable fundraising services; charitable fundraising services by means of a website where donors search for and make monetary donations to specific charities or projects aimed at public and societal benefit, disaster preparedness and disaster relief, education and youth development, environmental conservation and amelioration, medical and health services, civil rights and civil advocacy, and nutrition and food support; financial consulting services in the field of planned giving for non-profit and charitable organizations; charitable fundraising services, namely, accepting, managing, and disbursing monetary charitable contributions from individuals and organizations; administration, management, and investment of donor advised funds; providing on-line computer databases and on-line searchable databases in the field of fundraising and monetary donations
